properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 3:07AM CST until February 9 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...QUICK HITTING HEAVY SNOWFALL EXPECTED TO RESULT IN A PERIOD OF
HAZARDOUS TRAVEL LATER THIS MORNING AND INTO THE EARLY
AFTERNOON...

* WHAT...A period of moderate to heavy snow with rates of 1 inch
or more per hour possible for a short time during the mid
morning to early afternoon. Total snow accumulation of 2 to 4
inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust
as high as 35 mph at times.

* WHERE...Portions of central, east central, north central and
northeast Illinois.

* WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 3 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...High snow rates, combined with gusty southeasterly
winds will likely lead to roads becoming snow covered for a
time and hazardous travel.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
